attributes.additional_details:
Prevent the tour of the McBusted boyband (apologies for this next word but there's not a better term) supergroup tour.

Too long has our fair country been plagued by scientifically inaccurate ditties about poorly thought out time travelling misadventures and teen angsty love songs about members of the fairer sex with hair died an excessive amount of colours.

Please stop this next generation being exposed to the same musical travesties as what we've had to endure and join me in calling for the Department of Culture, Media and Sport to prevent this abomination of the "musical" (and I only use that term loosely) art.
